quote: 'An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.'
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: 'I’d rather regret the risks that didn’t work out than the chances I didn’t take at all.'
author: Simone Biles

quote: 'Pain is temporary
author: Quitting lasts forever.'

quote: 'Only the disciplined ones in life are free. If you are undisciplined
author: you are a slave to your moods and your passions.'

quote: 'Everybody’s got plans… until they get hit.'
author: Mike Tyson

quote: 'Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful
author: you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training

quote: 'Kill them with success and bury them with a smile.'
author: Usain Bolt

quote: 'It isn’t the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: 'It ain’t over till it’s over.'
author: Yogi Berra

quote: 'You are the handicap you must face. You are the one who must choose your place.'
author: James Lane Allen

quote: 'A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.'
author: Serena Williams

quote: 'You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.'
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: 'You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.'
author: Michael Jordan

quote: 'You have to believe in yourself when no one else does – that makes you a winner right there.'
author: Venus Williams

quote: 'You have to think it before you can do it. The mind is what makes it all possible.'
author: Kai Greene

quote: 'You have to train your mind like you train your body.'
author: Bruce Jenner

quote: 'You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.'
author: Lionel Messi

quote: 'The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.'
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: 'I didn’t come this far to only come this far
author: so we’ve still got further to go.'

quote: 'I like criticism. It makes you strong.'
author: LeBron James

quote: 'Your love makes me strong
author: your hate makes me unstoppable.'

quote: 'Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you do repeatedly.'
author: Shaquille O’Neal

quote: 'You can’t put a limit on anything. The more you dream
author: the farther you get.'
